thread.title: Erik Nachbahr to Present "Invest Now, Save Later: Your I.T. Game Plan" at AICPA National Auto Dealership Conference
thread.title_full: Erik Nachbahr to Present "Invest Now, Save Later: Your I.T. Game Plan" at AICPA National Auto Dealership Conference

author: admin
title: Erik Nachbahr to Present "Invest Now, Save Later: Your I.T. Game Plan" at AICPA National Auto Dealership Conference
text:
Carter West Public Relations 
TIMONIUM, Md., Oct. 12, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Helion Automotive Technologies , a leading provider of information technology (IT) solutions for auto dealers, announced today that its president and CEO, Erik Nachbahr, will be presenting at the AICPA National Auto Dealership Conference . In his session, "Invest Now, Save Later: Your I.T. Game Plan" Nachbahr will share the latest technologies that auto dealers should be prioritizing to ensure their IT networks are efficient and secure. The session is scheduled for Sunday, October 18th from 5:00 p.m. to 5:30 p.m. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151010/275917 
"Many dealers are overspending in certain areas, such as voice and data, while not spending enough in other areas like security and Internet bandwidth," said Nachbahr. "In my presentation I'll teach them how to assess their needs and how to invest their IT spend for maximum return on investment (ROI)." 
Session attendees will take away the following: -- How to assess your current IT infrastructure; learn whether your corporate platform, wireless and security networks are adequate for your needs -- How to identify if you are overspending; learn how to analyze your carrier bills and learn the latest recommendations for continuous up-time -- How to assess whether your current IT network is secure against the growing threat of cyber-attacks 
The AICPA National Auto Dealership Conference is the only conference that's geared toward CPAs and financial professionals in the auto industry. Nachbahr's presentation is ideal for CPAs with auto dealer clients and for dealership professionals including owners, general managers, CFOs, CEOs, controllers and auto manufacturer representatives. 
The AICPA Auto Conference is being held October 18th through 20th in Orlando, Florida. For more information, contact Helion Technologies at 443.541.1500 or https://www.heliontechnologies.com/contact/ 
About Helion Automotive Technologies 
Helion...Putting Your Dealership in the FAST LANE! Helion Automotive Technologies is a leading IT solutions provider, providing auto dealers with faster, more efficient networks and secure data protection. From managed services to IT assistance and service desk help, Helion offers both short-term IT fixes and long-term planning so dealers can focus on what matters most: selling more cars. Helion has specialized in IT for more than ten years and works with 650+ auto dealers nationwide. Dealers can request a free assessment of their IT needs at www.heliontechnologies.com. 
Media Contact: Holly Forsberg, Carter West Public Relations, 602-680-8960, hforsberg.cwpr@gmail.com 
News distributed by PR Newswire iReach: https://ireach.prnewswire.com 
SOURCE Carter West Public Relations
